transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan neeraj ji se baat ho rahi hai sunta rahe enterprises se?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Agar main baat kar rahi hu sir IndiaMART se kaise hain aap?
Customer: Bas badhiya ji bataiye aap.
Executive: Ji main badhiya sir thank you for asking. Actually sir aapne ye boliye shayad kal shivam ko call kiya tha to wo aapko call back nahi kar paye the I think. Aapka video meeting hua tha unke sath mein.
Customer: Nahi kal to baat hui thi meri unse.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji video meeting to aapne connect kiya tha unke sath mein uske baad I think aapne unhe call kiya tha half an hour ke baad mein to call shayad I think unse miss ho gaya to yaha pe hamare pass ek concern open ho gaya tha to wahi main janna chah rahi thi kuch issue aa raha hai to bataiye. Actually aaj wo list mein hain.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Nahi wo number nahi aa raha tha na isliye wo buyer ka number check kar raha tha to usme error dikha raha tha mujhe.
Executive: Achcha okay. Matlab by mistake laga aap se?
Customer: Nahi nahi. IndiaMART mein jab hum by leads mein check kar rahe the na.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: To usme na wo contact nahi show ho raha tha buyer wala ka jo IndiaMART mein jo inquiry aa rahi hai.
Executive: Achcha okay sir is wajah se aapne call kiya tha. Fir aapko mil gaya baad mein?
Customer: Nahi mila na mam.
Executive: Uh buyer ne call kiya tha aapko wo number nahi mila?
Customer: Main to by leads mein jo inquiry aati hai na IndiaMART pe.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Usme number show hota hai na ki buyer call aapko connect kar raha hai. By leads ki baat kar rahe hain jis customer ne message bheja hai ya inquiry bheji hai matlab uska.
Customer: Mam jisne by leads mein jisne jo jo aate hain na jisne jo search karte hain. Sab sabke number jo hai na wo lead manager mein hi aate hain.
Customer: To usme show nahi kar raha tha na usme message kar raha tha ki abhi pehle aap usko wo de do. Uske kya kehte hain. Maine share bhi kiya hua tha aapki madam ko. Hmm. Uske usme aa raha tha. Ye screen aisa. Ab ye package ke liye uske liye na package ke liye keh rahe the ki package dena padega. To maine mam se baat ki thi wo keh rahe the ki abhi update nahi hua.

Executive: Okay ek second. Ek baar dobara check kar leta hu IndiaMART khol ke ki active hai ya nahi nahi hai abhi. Active. Ek second ek second ruko main. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
Customer: WhatsApp karta hu.
Executive: Ji haan ji aapki aawaz nahi aa rahi hai na sahi. Abhi contact to buyer now. Aap theek hai?
Customer: Ek second main wahi check kar raha hu main. Haan nahi abhi aa gaya abhi isme naam aa raha hai.
Customer: Ji ji mam.
Executive: Customer bhi. Haan ye pehle naam nahi aa raha tha na number show nahi kar raha tha.
Executive: Achcha abhi aa raha hai na aapke pass mein. Ji ji haan ji haan ji. Haan jo bhi aap chahe aap abhi abhi bhi na hai na screen mein abhi bhi ye problem kar raha hai ye dekho main actually first ko main contact buyer karo na to usme dikha raha hai ki buy karo aap usko 399 mein.
Executive: Aapne sahi number se login kar rakha hai? 583 wala jo number hai na end mein us number se login karna hai aapko. Ek second main login kar rakha hai aap. Hmm dusre number se login to nahi ho rakha. Nahi nahi maine IndiaMART to install hai na mere mobile mein. Achcha main wahi puch rahi hu. Ek minute rukiye ya to ek minute kal jaise shivam ke sang jab aapne connect kiya tha to kal wo laptop. Haan ji haan ji. Wo wo maine laptop pe kiya tha. Hmm. To iska ye IndiaMART mein screen pe iska log off hota hai kya? Kis se dono se log out ho jata hai. Nahi nahi wo to theek hai main isme kis mein jaake karna padega wo. Aap na phone mein agar application mein use kar rahe hain aap home pe jaake top right hand side mein dekhiye. Home pe home pe nahi mera mam usi number pe hai 70583 pe. Usi se login kar rakha hai aapne? Bilkul usi pe hai. Okay to aapko lead purchase karne ka option dikha raha hai ek second rukiye ga main check kar leti hu agar aapke pass abhi bhi isme 350 isme 450 aise kar raha hai ki wo aap wo le lo usko connect karne ke liye. Achcha by lead balance aapka by lead balance zero dikha raha hai. Haan okay aapko theek hai lekin aapko please doctor successful hai. Humne aapka doctor successful hai. Humne aapka doctor successful hai. Ek. Hame na hafte ki 17 lead main bata deti hu aapko hafte ki sir 17 lead milti hai hafte ki 17 lead mein matlab 10 lead to aapki aisi rehti hai jo hafte bhar rehti hai. Wo aap matlab kaise bhi purchase kar sakte hain ek din pe do kar li aapne kisi din nahi bhi kare to. Sahi hai. Okay. Theek hai agar aapne maan lijiye aaj ki lead ek lead use nahi kari to wo kal aapko nahi milegi. Wo same day as lap expire ho jayegi. Wo carry forward nahi hoti matlab next day nahi badh ke aati hai aapko. Hmm. To aapne na kya kiya hai jaise kal ke din mein humne panch leads consume kar li. Theek hai aur usse pehle aapne 10 aapke pass nahi aa rahi hai. Second. Main aawaz nahi aa rahi hai abhi. Haan bas theek hai. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Buyer's contact number not showing in buyleads.

- Showing option to purchase leads despite subscription.



Resolution:

- Executive checked the customer's account details.

- Explained how weekly lead system works.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, lead balance, lead manager
